title: Teacher-Centered Instructional Design for Technology Integration in Elementary English Education

context.prior_knowledge: Basic English teaching methodologies and understanding of elementary educational environments
context.additional_context: Targets pre-service teachers with limited experience in educational technology tools but interested in teacher-centered instructional design.

learning_goals: Students can explain effective methods for utilizing digital resources (videos, PPT, quiz platforms) in teacher-centered English instruction.
Learners can propose lesson plan designs using educational technology tools (voice recording software, image editors) for elementary English class preparation.
Learners can anticipate potential issues (device malfunctions, accessibility limitations) during technology-based instruction and develop response strategies.

resources: Basic multimedia authoring software (PowerPoint, video editors)
Access to online quiz platforms (Kahoot, Google Forms)
Elementary English textbook samples and lesson plan templates

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
